title: Beautifully remodeled Historic Home Available - 5bdrms/2bth
posting_body: This beautifully architecturally designed historic home is renovated with new heating, plumbing, bathroom upgrade, flooring, appliances, and much more.
The house features a kitchen, living-room, dining-room, 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, central heating, and an over-sized backyard surrounded with privacy fencing throughout.
It is situated on one of the best tree-lined streets located in Highland Park!
Available for an immediate move-in for $1350
If interested, please call immediately to inquire about rental details:
